divs: Sighting Detailsfishing by the zilwakee bridge near bay city michigan with friends and i looked up while sitting in a lounge chair fishing and i noticed 3 points of light equally spaced moving north to south. I leaned over and asked friend if he had seen it and jokingly said he did not i was crazy and then said yes he was seeing it also. i am telling this now because i have noticed that the 3 points of light type sighting is a common one. you could tell how far the lights were apart that it was big in size...
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Bay City
There were no other sightings in Bay City on or around August 17th 2002
